mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_name =#{student_name}, student_id =#{student_id}, student_sex =#{student_sex}, student_address =#{student_address}, student_birthday =#{student_birthday}, student_schooldate =#{student_schooldate}, student_tel =#{student_tel}, student_ex =#{student_ex},class_no=#{class_no} WHERE student_no = #{student_no}

UPDATE teacher SET teacher_name =#{teacher_name}, teacher_id =#{teacher_id}, teacher_sex =#{teacher_sex}, teacher_address =#{teacher_address}, teacher_age =#{teacher_age}, teacher_work =#{teacher_work}, teacher_tel =#{teacher_tel}, teacher_ex =#{teacher_ex} WHERE teacher_no = #{teacher_no}
mapper.select: SELECT class_no,class_name,course_no,course_name,teacher_no,teacher_name FROM class,course,teacher WHERE (class_no,teacher_no) in (SELECT class_no,teacher_no FROM class_course_info WHERE course_no=#{course_no}) AND course_no=#{course_no}
